document.masterDocTitle: Scorpions of Iran (Arachnida, Scorpiones). Part VIII. Fars Province

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Scorpions of Iran (Arachnida, Scorpiones). Part VIII. Fars Province

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

, 122, 124– 126;

; Capes & Fet, 2001: 303.

caption.paragraph:
Figure 9:
Iranobuthus krali Kovařík, 1997
, live female from Iran, Fars Province, Dasht-e-Artzan, 29°34'N 51°56'E, 2000 m a.s.l., FKCP.

subSubSection.paragraph:
=?
Buthus eupeus kirmanensis Birula, 1900: 364
(see Fet & Lowe, 2000: 173).
Buthus ( Buthus ) eupeus kirmanensis : Birula, 1917: 239
; Birula, 1918: 14 .
Mesobuthus eupeus kirmanensis : Vachon, 1959: 155
; Vachon, 1966: 212; Habibi, 1971: 43 ; Farzanpay, 1988: 38 ; Fet, 1994: 527 ; Kovařík, 1997a: 49 ; Kovařík, 1998: 114 ; Fet & Lowe, 2000: 173; Mirshamsi et al., 2011: 9. =?
Buthus pachysoma Birula, 1900: 370
(syn. by Navidpour et al., 2011: 9).
Buthus eupeus pachysoma : Birula, 1905a: 128
.
Buthus ( Buthus ) eupeus pachysoma : Birula, 1917: 239
.

; Vachon, 1966: 212; Habibi, 1971: 43 ; Farzanpay, 1988: 38 ; Fet, 1994: 527 ; Kovařík, 1997a: 49 ; Kovařík, 1998: 114 ; Fet & Lowe, 2000: 174.
